AD_ShadowlandsComment.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on the state of the Shadowcurse and how it's effecting the land

nodes.speaker: Sentient Amulet
nodes.text: Darkness. Desolation. The Dark Lady's hand at work, mayhaps? HahaHA-HEE!
nodes.context: NodeContext: Said with the laughing madness so common to the character.
